subject: Umpires
Halls of Fame
Baseball
Statistics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Doug Harvey, who once told a complaining Mets manager, “I’m better than any replay machine you’ve got,” will join eight other umpires in an elite group possibly kept small by limited statistics.
snippet: Doug Harvey, who once told a complaining Mets manager, “I’m better than any replay machine you’ve got,” will join eight other umpires in an elite group possibly kept small by limited statistics.
